description: Main source file for a Flutter application that initializes Firebase, sets up environment configuration, and defines the app's widget hierarchy including routing, theme, and placeholder screens for login, attendance, and reports.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up MaterialApp with theme and routing.

classes.name: SplashRouterGate
classes.description: Widget that decides initial navigation based on authentication status.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget for user login interface.

classes.name: AttendanceScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget for attendance tracking page.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes environment, Firebase, and runs the app.

methods.name: _initFirebase
methods.description: Initializes Firebase with environment variables, optionally connects to local emulators.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget to construct its UI (overridden in widget classes).

methods.name: _decide
methods.description: Determines initial route based on user authentication state.
